description: These fluffy pancakes are packed with natural sweetness and warming flavour from pumpkin and cinnamon.
name: Pumpkin Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a little oil in a large, nonstick pan on medium heat and cook the pancake batter in batches, for 1-2 minutes on each side, until golden. Repeat with the rest of the oil and batter and serve with maple syrup.
